p: Raw data files acquired from the Orbitrap were converted into MGF files using Proteome Discoverer 1.2 (PD 1.2, Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc., Waltham, MA, USA). Protein identification was performed using the Mascot search engine (Matrix Science, London, UK; version 2.3.02) against the Uniprot Echinococcus database ( http://www.uniprot.org/taxonomy/?query=echinococcus&sort=score).
